articles.title: U.N. chief warns of 'catastrophic conflagration' in Sudan as foreign exodus accelerates - Reuters.com
articles.description: Western, Arab and Asian nations raced to extract their citizens from Sudan on Monday as the U.N. chief warned of the risk of "a catastrophic conflagration" with wider repercussions…

articles.author: Asia Financial
articles.title: China to Send Up Asteroid Probe, Explore Comet in 2025 - Asia Financial
articles.description: The Tianwen-2 mission will see a probe launched to rendezvous with the asteroid 2016HO3 before exploring a comet in the asteroid belt between Mars and Jupiter
articles.content:
China has revealed ambitious plans to send a probe to collect samples from a near-Earth asteroid and explore a comet, the official Xinhua news agency reported on Monday.
